name: tomotoru
description:
Spend time with your favorite adorable Sanrio characters!
Put yourself at ease as they play in the room you design for them.
Use the AR camera to bring your friends into your life.
Create lovely memories together with your friends!

Genre: Simulation & AR game
Price: Free (Offers in-app purchases)

~First Room~
"Shall I be the room manager while you're away?"
There's a letter, left by Daniel, who recently left on a trip.
Just as you arrive, you meet Hello Kitty who came to play, and become great friends.
"Oh yeah, just what does a room manager do?"
thought Kitty, before answering.
"It must be about making a lovely room!"
Work with Kitty to create a wonderful room everyone can enjoy!

◆◇◆[tomotoru ~Hello Kitty Happy Life~] special features◆◇◆

◆All your favorite Sanrio characters
・Hello Kitty
・Cinnamoroll
・My Melody
・Pompompurin
・Kerokerokeroppi
Choose form 5 of Sanrio's most beloved characters!
Make friends with them all to chat, relax, and even dress them all!
Tons of in-game "cuteness" awaits you!

◆Enjoy fun events with your friends in 5 different rooms
In addition to your "First Room", there are 5 other rooms ready to use.
With events like opening a cafe, a big mystery and more, endless adventures await you!
The events that happen in each character's room will all be recorded in the diary.

◆Take pictures with your friends using the AR camera
Bring your favorite Sanrio characters to life and take pictures together with the AR camera.
Hello Kitty in the palm of your hand, a selfie with Cinnamoroll!
Choose your favorite photos and then share them on social media!

-Terms and Conditions-
※The "First Room" can be played for free. Any subquennt rooms must be purchased.
